resources:
Golf Handicap App Welcome Golfers! Start a Round
Please Select Players
Add player to current game using Add Player button.
Create new player using Create Player button. Select a Player Enter First Name Enter Last Name ` Enter Current Handicap Add Player Create Player Save New Player to List (PLAYER ADD REQUIRED) Get Course
Please Select a Course
Add course to current game using Add Course button.
Create new course using Create Course button. Select a Course Add Course Create Course (COURSE ADD REQUIRED) Start Round
Add Course Data 1. Complete all fields 2. Enter Course Length 3. Enter Par For Each Hole Enter Course Name Enter Course Rating (Difficulty) Enter Course Slope Select Number of Holes
9
18
Hole Par Handicap ? Save Course
Your Round Has Started! (SELECTED COURSE) (COURSE RATING/SLOPE) Enter Score For Each Player Below H\'CAP ADJUSTED A B C D (PLAYER 1) (PLAYER 2) (PLAYER 3) (PLAYER 4) OUT FINISH GAME
Your Round is Finished! PLAYER 1 RESULTS: (NAME OF PLAYER 1) (PLAYER 1 SCORING) PLAYER 2 RESULTS: (NAME OF PLAYER 2) (PLAYER 2 SCORING) PLAYER 3 RESULTS: (NAME OF PLAYER 3) (PLAYER 3 SCORING) PLAYER 4 RESULTS: (NAME OF PLAYER 4) (PLAYER 4 SCORING) Push to Save Scoring to Golfer Profiles SAVE AND FINISH
